official_title: A bill to exclude the Fort Morgan Road from the Coastal Barrier Resources System in Baldwin County, Alabama, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Excludes the Fort Morgan Road (Alabama Highway 180) in Baldwin County, Alabama, from the Coastal Barrier Resources System. Prohibits the construction of structures within the System that will allow exit from such highway.

titles.title: A bill to exclude the Fort Morgan Road from the Coastal Barrier Resources System in Baldwin County, Alabama, and for other purposes.
